title: Dodging a game
body: So yesterday I was playing a ranked solo que game on NA, when in chat (the text was orange meaning someone didn't say it) it said that one of the players was punished multiple times for inting and that it was recommended that we dodge. It also said that no dodge penalties would be issued to the player that dodged, however when I dodged i was still issued the dodge penalties. Any ideas?

replies.body: That message was probably someone using the /me command to emote and not an official Riot message. Riot has not invaded a live game's chat to coerce people into intentionally leaving a match for any reason at all, since it's not really the best display of good sportsmanship. Be sure to check over the [queue dodging faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)!
Alright thanks for the info! wont be doing that anymore.

did this happen in champ select? because if so then you were trolled.
In the new champ select chat, there is a command/emote that makes the text orange, like this:

/me does a funny dance

would then come out into orange slightly bolded text like:

**Wolfess** does a funny dance

so basically they tricked you into dodging for them.
